name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: (It is a great Grace and Protection from Allah), for the taming of the Quraish,

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: (And with all those Allah's Grace and Protections for their taming, We cause) the (Quraish) caravans to set forth safe in winter (to the south), and in summer (to the north without any fear),

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: So let them worship (Allah) the Lord of this House (the Ka'bah in Makkah).

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: (He) Who has fed them against hunger, and has made them safe from fear.
